hadiths.text: Bahz bin Hakim narrated from his father that his grandfather said:"If something was brought to him, the prophet would ask whether it was a gift or charity. If it was said that if was charity, he would not eat, and if it was said that it was a gift, he would stretch forth his hand

chapter.ara-name: باب الصَّدَقَةِ لاَ تَحِلُّ لِلنَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم
chapter.eng-name: Charity Is Not Permissible For The Prophet
